title: Allow the Northern Ireland Border to be closed to the Northern Ireland Border
body:
The Northern Ireland Border should be closed to the Northern Ireland Border. This will not only deter the British and Irish Border, but will also protect the Northern Ireland Border.
The Northern Ireland Border is a vital part of the Irish and English border. It is a vital entry point into the Irish and English border and will serve the purpose of both, providing safe passage for refugees and migrants.
The Northern Ireland Border should be closed to the Northern Ireland Border.

title: Improve the height of any building to 6ft.
Greater transparency on the proposed A10 southbridge toll road
body:
The A10 northbridge toll road is to be built at a cost of £1.8 billion. This toll road would cross the New Forest and cross the Scotland Channel and would be a major artery for the BHP.
The current toll road should be rebuilt and the cost of the new road should be increased to £1.8 billion.
Please sign this petition to support the government to make the road more transparent and to make sure that the road is a safe and environmentally sound alternative to the existing toll road.

title: Ban all free transportation between 1st & 2nd worlds
body:

title: Increase funding for the BBC
body: We the undersigned request the Government increase the funding to £2.9 billion by the end of 2015. This is significantly less than the current budget of £1.5 billion

title: Reform the NHS to provide the best care and services for patients with multiple sclerosis
body: The NHS is a public service and patients have the right to express their wishes and any suggestion that the NHS is not for their benefit to be raised.

title: Petition to ban the use of elephants in the UK
body: The use of elephants in the UK is a tragedy and is pre-meditated by the government. The government should stop this barbaric practice.

title: Reduce the number of rail, bus and buses available to people with disabilities in the UK
body: The current system is biased and lacks the support of many disabled people. The current system is not working for everyone and provides many people with a false sense of security.

title: No more calls for a second EU referendum
body:
The citizens of the UK have the right to support any decision made by the UK Government. However, we should not be allowed to vote for Brexit by relying on a second referendum.

The people of the UK are entitled to their own views and opinions, and we should not be a negotiating power, we are a debating power.

We have a democratic parliament, and we are entitled to the same rights as all other governments in the EU.

The referendum was a referendum for the people of the UK, not for an exclusive decision of the UK Government.

That same referendum was a referendum on the UK Government's own decision to leave the EU, which the people of the UK voted to leave.

We petition that the UK Government does not ask a second referendum on the issue of a second EU referendum.
